original_text:
Her princes were purer than snow,
    whiter than milk;
their bodies were more ruddy than coral,
    the beauty of their form was like sapphire.
korean_text: 전에는 존귀한 자들의 몸이 눈보다 깨끗하고 젖보다 희며 산호들보다 붉어 그들의 윤택함이 갈아서 빛낸 청옥 같더니

sentences.original_text: Her princes were purer than snow
their bodies were more ruddy than coral
the beauty of their form was like sapphire
